com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui
Class DataSourceWindowManager

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.DataSourceWindowManager

public final class DataSourceWindowManager
extends Object

Class responsible for DataSourceViews manipulation.

Author:
Jiri Sedlacek

Method Summary
 boolean canOpenDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
          Returns true if there is at least one provider providing at least one view for given DataSource, false otherwise.
 void closeDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
          Closes the DataSource.
 void openDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
          Opens the DataSource and selects the view.
 void openDataSource(DataSource dataSource, boolean selectView)
          Opens the DataSource and optionally selects the view.
 void selectView(DataSourceView view)
          Opens the DataSource if needed and selects the DataSourceView.
static DataSourceWindowManager sharedInstance()
          Returns singleton instance of DataSourceWindowManager.
